text: Tsanko Hantov also written as Цанко Хантов (born 11 August 1976) is a Bulgarian modern pentathlete, fencer and fencing coach. With fencing Hantov, was junior national epee champion in 1995 and 1996. He became national senior champion in 1998. In modern pentathlon he participated in the men's individual pentathlon event at the 2000 Summer Olympics in Sydney. The next year he won the bronze medal at the 2001 World Modern Pentathlon Championships. Htantov was a fencing coach for over seven years. He is the owner of the "Windy City Fencing", an epee fencing club in Chicago, where is also the head coach since 2005. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Modern pentathletes Category:Sportspeople from Sofia Category:Fencers
title: Tsanko Khantov
